title: Mermaid Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A mythical being of the sea, part huperson and part fish, with a medium-light skin tone. This emoji evokes wonder, folklore, and the enchanting realm of underwater legends.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's mermaid emoji, with a radiant medium-light skin tone, embodies enchanting beauty with its shimmering tail and flowing hair, all brought to life by Apple's masterful glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. The design features soft, rounded edges that enhance its mythical allure, conveying a sense of wonder and fantasy. This mystical being, often used to express dreams, imagination, or a touch of magic, brings a captivating charm to messages sent on Apple devices.
